TextView.android:text: What was the time of death?
What was the place of death?
If died in health facility, then what is the name of health facility?
8. What was/were the cause(s) of death of the deceased?
Were you told by a health care professional what the cause of death was for the deceased?
What was the causes of death stated by the health professional
Which category does the death apply to?
Was this death enrolled in the CHAMPS MS study?
Is the MS CHAMPS ID known?
If yes, what is the MS CHAMPS ID if the death occurred in a child under-five year of age?
